titles: A letter from Exeter, advertizing the state of affairs there also, a letter to the Right Honourable William Lenthall, Esq. Speaker of the Parliament. Exon, Jan. 14.
notes: Giving the text of a protest to Parliament, passed at a meeting of the gentry of the county of Devon, urging the recall of the excluded members.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Exeter (England) --  History --  17th century --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
